name: databox-driver-mobile
description: A Databox driver that provides SensingKit mobile sensor data

scripts.release: docker build -t databox-driver-mobile . && docker tag databox-driver-mobile amar.io:5000/databox-driver-mobile && docker push amar.io:5000/databox-driver-mobile

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
